title: Naperville, Illinois
summary: Naperville (/ˈneɪpərˌvɪl/ NAY-pər-vil) is a city in DuPage and Will counties in the U.S. state of Illinois, and a suburb of Chicago. Located 28 miles (45 km) west of Chicago, Naperville was founded in 1831 and is the fourth most populous city in Illinois.[4] As of the 2020 United States Census, its population was 149,540.[5]
